application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 6 (Protection of trees during construction - details required) of planning permission 24/04885 (Erection of 3-storey rear extension; single storey front porch with flat roof and new steps leading to the front door; alterations to window openings; replacement of all windows with double glazed timber framed windows, white finish to match existing; internal alterations; conversion of loft to habitable rooms with 3no. flat roof dormer windows to the rear - dormer windows to be finished in lead; addition of conservation rooflight to front elevation; and installation of air conditioning unit in rear garden.)
